distinct
from contest
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into contest (contest_id, startTime, endTime, paper_id, title, teacher, fk_course_id) values (#{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update contest
contest_id = #{record.contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startTime = #{record.starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paper_id = #{record.paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

fk_course_id = #{record.fkCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update contest set contest_id = #{record.contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{record.starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paper_id = #{record.paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher = #{record.teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_course_id = #{record.fkCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_course_id = #{fkCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where contest_id = #{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update contest set startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_course_id = #{fkCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where contest_id = #{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from contest where teacher = #{0} order by endTime desc
